sect1.title: Installation Procedure
sect1.para: This section goes over the procedure of installing a simple &susemgr; reference setup.

step.para: Boot the server using the latest ISO image found at:”insert http link” You may install SUSE Manager using many formats, CDROM, USB, or the ISO itself with virtualization in KVM, Vmware etc or network boot with PXE. For more information see also: insert link to reference guide
Use the up and down arrow keys to select the option Install/Restore SUSE-Manager-Server and then press enter.
